content: the abilee scarf by suzy daisy boo creations *disclaimer* pattern copyright © daisy boo creations 2018 this pattern is licensed for unlimited personal use you are strictly prohibited from reproducing or selling this pattern the pattern may not be copied in any way print or digitally in part or in full except for personal reference by purchasing this pattern you are granted a limited license to create items to be sold that are made from this pattern subject to the following conditions all items must include a credit to daisy boo creations including the pattern name and website www daisyboo net if you are unsure as to how this license affects you please contact suzy@daisyboo net this pattern is written using uk terms with us terms written in brackets alongside you will also find a chart at the end for this pattern i used a scheepjes whirls in blackcurrant squeeze me a 3 5mm crochet hook scissors and a sewing needle stitches used chain - chain sl-st - slip_stitch st - stitch double_crochet - uk double_crochet us single_crochet - single_crochet treble_crochet - uk treble_crochet us double_crochet - double_crochet dtr - uk double treble_crochet us treble_crochet - treble_crochet picot - chain 3 slip_stitch into the 3rd chain from the hook pattern before we start the pattern you need to unwind around 10g of yarn make sure this colour is the colour you intend to start with as it becomes the bottom edging we will return to this bit of yarn at the end 1 to start either make a magic_ring chain 4 this is your first stitch then make 3 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 2 3 treble_crochet double_crochet 1 dtr treble_crochet all in the magic_ring then tighten to fasten or chain 5 in the 5th chain from the hook make the following all in the same chain 3 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 2 3 treble_crochet double_crochet 1 dtr treble_crochet turn 2 chain 4 this is your first stitch in the same stitch make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts in the centre chain 2 space make the following 2 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts in the last stitch make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet and 1 dtr treble_crochet turn 3 chain 4 this is your first stitch in the same stitch make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the next stitch chain 2 miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts in the centre chain 2 space make the following 2 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts chain 2 miss 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st in the last stitch make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet and 1dtr treble_crochet turn 4 chain 4 this is your first stitch in the same stitch make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain 2 space chain 2 miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet
